messages.content: Kimberly Kim works with Donald Murphy.
Donald Murphy is a colleague of Samuel Harrison.
Samuel Harrison works with Janet West.
Janet West is a colleague of Virginia Rivera.
Virginia Rivera works with Amanda Bryant.
Amanda Bryant is a colleague of Martha Lopez.
Martha Lopez works with Christine Tran.
Christine Tran is a colleague of Justin Gibson.
Justin Gibson works with Edward Woods.
Edward Woods is a colleague of Nicholas Gibson.

queries.question: Are Kimberly Kim and Nicholas Gibson related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
